Package net.sourceforge.cilib.Domain

Interface Summary
DomainVisitor Special visitor type for visiting instances of specific domains.
 

Class Summary
Bit  
ComponentFactory This class can be used to create a composite component structure given a string representation for the domain.
Composite This class is used to represent domains of the form [C, C, ..., C] where C is another domain component.
Compound This class can be used to represent domains of the form C^N where C is another domain component and N is an integer representing the dimension of this component.
DomainComponent A composite structure of Component classes describe the legal values for an object that is a member of a domain.
DomainVisitorAdapter Null implementation of DomainVisitor interface
Int This class can be used to represent integer valued components.
Measurement  
Qualitative  
Quantitative This class can is the base class for quantitive domain components.
Real This class can be used to represent continuous valued components.
Set This class can be used to represent set valued domains.
Text  
Unknown  
Vector
